channel.title: Lean on Tales of a technology enthusiast
channel.description: Recent content in Lean on Tales of a technology enthusiast

item.title: Kanban - get more things done!
item.description: Photo by Daria Nepriakhina on Unsplash A bit more than 3 years ago when I took the responsibility for a large region with 21 people spread all over the territory, I felt overwhelmed very quickly.

item.title: Continous Learning
item.description: Lean concept I see myself as a Lean Practitioner and I try, as much as I can, to stick to Lean’s principles. Lean was coined from a book written by James P.
